The chosen password is too weak. A valid: Izbrano geslo je prešibko. Veljavno geslo mora imeti najmanj 10 znakov in vsebovati različne znake, vključno z vsaj malo tiskano črko, veliko tiskano črko, številko in posebnim znakom.

Using automatic HTTPS configuration will: Z uporabo samodejne nastavitve HTTPS bo opravljen celoten postopek zahtevanja, omogočanja in obnavljanja certifikatov od organa Let's Encrypt za izdajo certifikatov.
The platform must be reachable through a: Platforma mora biti dostopna na javnem IP naslovu, izbrano ime gostitelja mora imeti ustrezen zapis DNS, ki se sklicuje na ta naslov.
The manual configuration wizard will gui: Čarovnik za ročno konfiguracijo vas bo vodil skozi nastavitev HTTPS-ja od drugega organa za certifikate.

Make a copy and store it in a safe place: Naredite dodaten izvod in ga shranite na varno mesto. Potrebovali ga boste za dostop do vašega računa brez izgube podatkov, če izgubite svoje geslo.
If you need technical support, have gene: Če potrebujete tehnično podoporo, imate splošna vprašanja ali nove ideje za programsko opremo:

Hint: How to hide your receipt: Namig, kako skriti vašo šifro ključa
A useful way to hide your receipt is to: A useful way to hide your receipt is to write it down like a credit card number, i.e. by also including an expiration date.

Chat with us anonymously using the Ricoc: Chat with us anonymously using the Ricochet application
To chat with us use the following Ricoch: To chat with us use the following Ricochet address:
By using the Tor network and creating an: Pri uporabi omrežja Tor in ustvarjanju storitev Onion deluje aplikacija za takojšnje sporočanje Ricochet, ki vam omogoča pogovore, obenem pa ščiti vašo zasebnost in zagotavlja anonimnost s prikritjem vaše lokacije in IP naslova. V primerjavi z nezavarovanimi sporočili ne boste opazili nobene razlike, razen da boste uporabljali edinstven naslov namesto telefonske številke/e-naslova/uporabniškega imena.
The platform is still not configured for: The platform is still not configured for HTTPS connections and should therefore only be used for testing purposes.
Recipients have requested you to fill an: Prejemniki želijo, da izpolnite dodaten vprašalnik.

Are you sure that you want to delete the: Ali ste prepričani, da želite zbrisati prijavo?
Everything related to the report stored: Vsi s prispevkom povezani podatki bodo izbrisani.
Please be aware that everything stored o: Vse podatke, ki so hranjeni izven platforme, na primer priloge prenešene na vaš računalnik, je potrebno izbrisati ročno.
Are you sure that you want to delete the: Ali ste prepričani, de želite izbrisati izbrane prispevke?
Please make sure that all related data i: Please make sure that all related data is properly deleted so that the recipients won't be able to further access to it.
Please write a motivation for the reply: Please write a motivation for the reply
By confirming, you will postpone the exp: S potrditvijo, prelagate rok veljavnosti do:

We recommend that you access the “Prefer: We recommend that you access the “Preferences” section in order to retrieve your “Account Recovery Key” and store it safely. This key will be necessary to recover your access to the platform and to your data in case you forget your password.
Ta ključ za obnovo ni veljaven.
The provided reset token is invalid or e: The provided reset token is invalid or expired.

Enter you encryption recovery key to com: Vnesite vaš šifrirani ključ za obnovo za zaključek postopka ponastavitve gesla.
Access to the whistleblower's identity h: Zahtevek za dostop do identitete žvižgača je bil posredovan skrbniku.
Your whistleblowing platform is almost r: Vaša platforma za prijave je skoraj končana!
If not activated within 24 hours the pla: If not activated within 24 hours the platform will be automatically deleted.
You are connecting to the server without: Z vozliščem se povezujete neanonimno, toda to vozlišče podpira zgolj anonimne naznanitve.
We will try to get back to you as soon a: Skušali vam bomo odgovoriti v čim krajšem času.
Use the 16 digit receipt to log in. It w: Use the 16 digit receipt to log in. It will allow you to view any messages we sent you, and also to add extra info.
Select the recipients of your report:: Select the recipients of your report:
You have reached the maximum number of s: You have reached the maximum number of selectable recipients.
The following recipients will receive yo: The following recipients will receive your report and could not be deselected:
In this step the answers to the followin: In this step the answers to the following questions are either missing or invalid:
The following step-by-step procedure wil: The following step-by-step procedure will guide you through creating your whistleblowing platform.
We advise selecting this option if you w: We advise selecting this option if you would like to protect data from being lost in the situation where recipients lose their passwords. On the other hand, we would not advise using this feature if you want to setup a system where only recipients are able to access submissions.
I have read and agree to the terms of th: I have read and agree to the terms of the license.

You're receiving this email because a us: You're receiving this email because a user account has been created for you on the system: {Site}
Please click on the activation link to p: Kliknite na povezavo za aktivacijo za nadaljevanje aktivacije računa in nastavitev vašega uporabniškega gesla.
After successful activation you will be: After successful activation you will be able to access the system via the following link: {LoginUrl}
Your whistleblowing platform is now acce: Your whistleblowing platform is now accessible at:
The number of activities recently detect: Število zaznanih dejavnosti se zdi višje kot običajno.
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: Strežnik ne more zagotoviti shranjevanja novih prijav, zato je oddajanje onemogočeno.
Please consider asking your technical su: Zaprosite tehnično podporo, naj zagotovi več prostora na disku strežnika.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: GlobaLeaks technology includes a server status checking component which will alert you in case something requires your attention.
For more information, log in to the Admi: For more information, log in to the Administration interface and look at the "System Stats" and "Anomalies" sections.
This is an email to inform you that the: This is an email to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or has already expired:
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Brez veljavnega PGP ključa, sistem ne more pošiljati kodiranih sporočil.
A new whistleblowing site has been regis: A new whistleblowing site has been registered.
This is a test email sent out from the p: Testno elektronsko sporočilo iz administrativnega vmesnika platforme.
Reception of this email indicates that t: Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a request has been made to change your email address to {NewEmailAddress}.
Click the following link to validate thi: Za potrditev spremembe kliknite na povezavo:
If you didn't request this change, chang: Če niste zahtevali spremembe, takoj zamenjajte geslo in obvestite sistemskega administratorja.
The HTTPS certificate loaded on the plat: The HTTPS certificate loaded on the platform is about to, or has already expired.
Without a valid certificate, the platfor: Brez veljavnega certifikata lahko do platforme varno dostopate le z brskalnikom Tor.
Log in to solve the issue.
The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal: The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal scheduled for today just failed.
This is an email to notify you that a cu: This is an email to notify you that a custodian has authorized you to access to the whistleblowing identity for the report {TipNum}.
This is an email to notify you that a custodian has denied you access to the whistleblowing identity for the report {TipNum}.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a recipient has requested access to the whistleblower's identity for the report {TipNum}
New request of access to a whistleblower: Nov zahtevek za dostop do identitete žvižgača
This is an email to notify you that the: This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower for the report {TipNum} has provided their identity.
You're receiving this email because a pa: To sporočilo ste prejeli, ker ste zahtevali spremembo gesla za uporabniški račun: {Username}
If you didn't make this request, you may: Če niste poslali te zahteve, lahko mirno prezrete in izbrišete to e-pošto.
You can confirm your request by clicking: Svojo zahtevo lahko potrdite s klikom na to povezavo:
This is an email to inform you that your: To sporočilo vas obvešča, da PGP ključ poteče ali, da je že potekel.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.
Click the link to activate the platform:: Kliknite na povezavo za aktivacijo platforme:
It is good security practice to keep the: Dobra varnostna praksa, da platformo redno posodabljate.
To learn about new features and bug fixe: Če želite izvedeti več o novih funkcijah in popravkih napak v novi različici, si oglejte zapis sprememb na: {ChangeLogUrl}
For instructions on software updates, pl: Za navodila o posodobitvah programske opreme glejte dokumentacijo na: {UpdateGuideUrl}
Please remember to check them before the: Ne pozabite jih pregledati, preden bodo izbrisani.
Some reports will expire soon: Nekaterim prijavam se bo kmalu iztekel rok hranjenja
This is an email to notify you that a wh: s tem sporočilom vas obveščamo, da vas je prijavitelj določil kot prejemnika prijave.
You are asked to pay special attention t: Prosimo vas, da z infromacijami in gradivom ravnate z vso potrebno skrbnostjo. Zavedajte se, da se žvižgači pogosto osebno izpostavijo velikim tveganjem v interesu javnosti. Zato obravnavajte gradiva, ki so del te prijave, kot zelo pomembna.
This is an email to notify that an exist: To je e-pošta z obvestilom, da je bila obstoječa prijava dopolnjena.
This email is to remind you the presence: To e-sporočilo vas opominja na neprebrane ali dopolnjene prijave.
Reminder about unread or updated reports: Opomnik o neprebranih ali dopolnjenih prijavah.
